page.title: 02LOCAL POLITICS, MRS THATCHER
page.content: Though Mrs Margaret Thatcher the current and the first woman British Prime Minister was born and brought up in Grantham she did not live in this NE area. Her school, Kestevan and Grantham Girls School, which is still a single sex girls grammar school, lies just on the edge of our survey area. The present local MP is the Conservative member Mr Douglas Hogg who actually lives further north closer to Lincoln. The area is generally regarded as safe Tory. In the local ward elections however certain districts around Grantham are more likely to vote Labour or even the new SDP persuasion.A recent vacancy has arisen in the local Harrowby ward due to the death of the local councillor. The forth coming bi-election will test the popularity of the current Conservative Government
